pages.title: Better Animals Plus
pages.text: BA+ seeks to bring new life and creatures to your worlds, all with a unique flair and aesthetic compared to similar mods. BA+ adds many passive mobs, hostile mobs, and even a miniboss. Though animals is not where BA+ ends. There is more to it than it seems...$(br2)$(l:https://better-animals-plus.fandom.com/wiki/Better_Animals_Plus_Wiki)Better Animals Plus Wiki$(/l)
